20110120024605.000|20110120024605.000|CC1|WOULD LIKE TO KNOW WHETHER I    
20110120024605.000|20110120024606.000|CC1|HAVE ALZHEIMER'S.               
20110120024606.000|20110120024608.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BUT DOCTORS HAVEN'T

20110120024614.000|20110120024616.000|CC1|SHOWS THAT AN IMAGING TEST CAN
